original_title: Liberating a Continent: John Paul II and the Fall of Communism
overview: One of history's greatest examples of the triumph of spiritual power over violence and oppression is vividly recounted in Liberating a Continent: John Paul II and the Fall of Communism, a new documentary film that poignantly captures the intricate role played by John Paul in the fall of Communism and the liberation of central and Eastern Europe.
title: Liberating a Continent: John Paul II and the Fall of Communism
